##__Skating in Philly__

I learned figure skating for about 5 years as a kid. These photos recorded my first experience of skating with ice hockey skates. Outdoor rink under lights and the city hall is amazing.

##__Happily Ever After__

Firework at Orlando Disney. It is the fourth Disney that I have ever been to and it has the best firework show among them all. The other three at Hongkong, Tokyo, and Anaheim have better parades.
